children.value: Display message prompts at the top of the page, supporting component calling and function calling.
In order to facilitate the use of
, zebra provides a series of auxiliary functions through which global message prompts can be quickly evoked.
function, the corresponding prompt will be rendered directly on the page after being called.
Customize the color, position and display duration of message notifications.
If you need to embed components or other custom content within Notify, you can use the Notify component directly and customize it using the default slot.

props.code:
<z-cell is-link title="Use Notify component" @click="showComponentCall" />
<z-notify
   v-model:show="show"
   type="success"
   custom-navbar
   use-component
>
   <z-icon name="notification" />
   <text style="margin-left: 8rpx">Content</text>
</z-notify>

children.value: Zebra exports the following Notify related auxiliary functions:
Show Notify at the top of the page
Modify the default configuration, affecting all
Resets the default configuration, affecting all
display duration (ms), when the value is 0, notify will not disappear
Set the component's z-index level to a fixed value
through a component, the following Props are supported:
Set the component's z-index level to a fixed value
through a component, the following events are supported:
through a component, the following slots are supported:
The component provides the following CSS variables, which can be used to customize styles. For usage, please refer to

html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}
